title: Got to 1999 game need some rioters PLEASE!!!
body: i have no idea where to put this anymore with the boards set up i didn't do this for my 1000 but for 2000 i would love to play with some of my favorite company employees please because riot rocks

replies.body: Let me know when works for you, and we can set something up!
well it may not be 2000 because i've sorta played one it is hard to get you guys with the board set up :( but anytime except tomorrow because you know worlds event
